channel.title: Drink and Drive on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Drink and Drive on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: What Makes a Car Lovable? It's Not the Tech, It's the Cup Holders
item.description: Frustration with the size, location, and design of cup holders in new cars is on the rise—and it holds enormous influence on whether we buy a ride or not.
